# Key Ideas

* We observe mutational signature activity to vary on a large scale across the genome. 
* Chromatin changes over the course of tumour evolution may be shared across many tumours of the same tissue type. In particular: Melanoma, CLL. 


# Citation

Caitlin Timmons, Quaid Morris, and __Caitlin F. Harrigan__, “Regional Mutational Signature Activities in Cancer Genomes,” bioRxiv [preprint], Jan. 2022, doi: 10.1101/2022.01.23.477261.
